data.text: Niizu è Ɓɛtɛ Nui, ɗɛi è ga Izilayɛle,
Siɛgi zu è ziɛiti maazuɓudɛzu la,
Mazɔlɔɔ nà ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-ƓALAGI,
Tɔɔzei è-zɔngɔi wɔɔlɔʋɛ gàazu,
Maaɠili mina ɠɛ è ma,
Nà ɠɛ lɛkpɛmaʋɛ ma nu ɠɔʋɛzuʋɛ: ‹Ti ve,›
nii kpein dàaseigi ʋɛai ba,
Nuɓusɛi nii ti ɠula kɛlɛma,
Zii ɠiligiti pɛ ti ɠaalɛ ba,
«Nà-zeeleiti ta ga woye, nà-nuɓusɛiti,
«Nà ya, nà ɠa gè ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI,
Nà ɠa pàai ga kizo vai,
«Nà ɠana nɔ, kaite wɔlɔwɔlɔ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa,
Nà ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, wa-ƓALA Ɲadegai,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa,
é kɔɔɠɔ wotoloiti ta sooiti pilɛsu siɛi laawu,
«À mina mɔ ɠigaiziɛ faa wɔlɔmaiti su, ti leʋegai,
Wɛlɛ, nà faa niinɛ ɠɛɛzu,
Dɔɓɔ zuaiti, koʋeiti, saa wɔnigiti,
Nà-nuɓusɛiti gè ti ɓɛtɛni nà ɓɔɠɔ ʋɛ,
«Ee, Zakɔɓe, nà laade, è ʋa wooɠula mà.
Nà la ɠɛni de, è ʋa ɠɛni baala ziʋo zalaɠaiti kulazu bɛ̀ ga gala zalaɠai,
È la ɠɛni wali ɠulani ɓɔɠɔ ma nà-faa zu,
«Kɛlɛ nà ya, nà ɠila kpe ka gè ɗa-lɔ koloɠologiti gaaʋaazu nà ɓɔɠɔi màaʋele ma,
Ɠigaiziɛ nà-faa zu, de felegɔ de yɔɠɔzuɠula.
Mɔunpa, è-mɛmɛwola mɔungi kotoi ɠɛɛni dàalɔɠɔma,
Naa ma ka é kɛɛni gè ɓaaɠulani seizu ɲadegai ma ɠundiɠiiti ma,
